content: The objectives of the course are a) To discuss intellectual property strategy to protect the inventions and innovations of new ventures. b) To develop skills of commercial appreciation by allocating knowledge about substantive aspect of management strategy and legal literature. c) The course will make the students appreciate the nature, scope and differences of IP, its different utilities and approaches, and to manage and strategize IP lifecycle effectively throughout the journey of start-up, in a time when it is aspired highly by the economy and society. d) Students will learn the fundamentals and advanced strategies of IP. They will be given opportunity for understanding the same in MSME sector. They will finally be trained with the valuation techniques and audits of IP.
